name: Benjamin Sperry
bio: Benjamin Sperry is a biologist who has dedicated his career to improving lives through innovative mosquito control. Driven by a desire to tackle the worldâ€™s most pressing problems, he co-founded Gleipnir LLC to address the damaging effects of misaligned incentives in technology. Benjamin believes in empowering people, fostering collaboration, and building solutions that create abundance for all. When not solving complex problems, he enjoys riding his bike and spending time with his amazing wife and four incredible children.
